results.title: Kitchen management principles
results.creator_credit: Joseph Cote, Joe Hayward and Moreland-Latchford Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Cooking, home economics”.
Presents five concepts dealing with kitchen management - the kitchen, planning for efficiency, cleanliness and safety, setting the table and washing up. Suitable for lower and middle secondary levels.

results.title: Food for health
results.creator_credit: Joseph Cote, Joe Hayward and Moreland-Latchford Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Cooking, home economics”.
Presents six concepts conerning foods: a balanced diet, proteins and minerals, carbohydrates and fats, vitamins, food guides and calories. Suitable for secondary level.

results.title: Conserving Our Environment
results.media_note: Sorry, we don't have images or video for this item.

results.title: The Pollution crisis
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Conserving Our Environment”.
As population increases, waste products are discarded in such increasing quantities that they cannot be absorbed by the environment, and pollution reaches crisis proportions. Shows some of the ways we are polluting our land, sea and air, and offers various solutions for protecting our environment.

results.title: Use and reuse
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Conserving Our Environment”
How does a living organism relate to its environment? Dean learns about the ecological systems of the earth as he observes the ecological system of a fishbowl. He discovers how humans relate to their environment - how we use it, destroy it and restore it.

results.title: Confusion in the elderly
results.media_note: Sorry, we don't have images or video for this item.

results.title: Management in hospital
results.brief_description:
Episode number 4 of Series “Confusion in the elderly”.
One of a series about the techniques for management and treatment of confusion in the elderly. This demonstrates a variety of treatments of admission to hospital. Shows actual patients with different presentations of confusion, and outlines basic principles of management designed to allow the patients to get the most out of life.

results.title: Management in the community
results.brief_description:
Episode number 3 of Series “Confusion in the elderly”.
One of a series about the techniques for management and treatment of confusion in the elderly. Traces the case of an elderly woman whose family wants to have her committed to hospital or a home. However, with medical advice it is possible for her to remain at home.
